+ NOTICE OF FUNDING OPPORTUNITY (NOFO)
+ ReConnect Program - Round 5
+ Application Deadline: March 15, 2026
+
+ The U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) Rural Utilities Service (RUS)
+ announces the availability of approximately $1.1 billion in loan and grant
+ funds for the ReConnect Program to facilitate broadband deployment in rural areas.
+
+ Eligible applicants include state and local governments, territories,
+ federally recognized Tribes, nonprofits, for-profit corporations,
+ and limited liability companies.
+
+ Key Dates:
+ - Application Window Opens: February 1, 2026
+ - Application Deadline: March 15, 2026
+ - Industry Day: February 10, 2026
+
+ Contact: reconnect@usda.gov
